2. Next, determine if 'clemson' was the third-place team in the same year. The column for "runner - up" is at index 3, but since we are looking for third place and not runner-up, we ignore this step. The semi-finalist columns can potentially be the third-place team. We compare the value of each row (index 2) with 'clemson'. In this case, 'clemson' is at row index 1.

3. Finally, check if the third-place team lost to the champion in the same year. Since we already found that 'clemson' was the semi-finalist (third place) in the year 2005, and there exists a row where both 'champion' (elon) and 'semi - finalist 1' (clemson) belong to the same year, it means that clemson lost to elon (the champion).
